description:
Modeling a tire looks pretty complex because of its shape and overload of details. In this course I will show you how to model a high poly tire in less then 30 minutes with just a few easy steps. When the course ends you will be able to make any complex tire with 3ds max.


This course will also help you to learn the basics of high poly modeling.

We will take use of the turbosmooth modifier and you will learn how to use a bump map to texture a good looking print on the side.

This course is suited for beginners but also for advanced 3ds max users.
title: How to make a high poly tire with 3ds max
